title: The BluePrint Series: A Fireside Chat with Rich Tu
introduction: Join us for an exclusive evening with Rich Tu, the award-winning designer behind the official NY/NJ 2026 FIFA World Cup poster, and a creative powerhouse known for his work with Nike, MTV, and culture-shaping campaigns across the globe.
description: Presented as part of The Gradient's Blueprint Series, this fireside chat—moderated by Love Malone, CEO of The Gradient—will dive into Rich's creative journey, his thoughts on where the industry is headed, and how design continues to shape identity, storytelling, and the future of culture.

agenda.title: WELCOME AND OPENING
agenda.description: Join us for an exclusive evening with Rich Tu, the award-winning designer behind the official NY/NJ 2026 FIFA

agenda.title: FIRESIDE CHAT
agenda.description: Rich Tu shares his creative journey and insights into the design world.

faq.question: What is the schedule for the event?
faq.answer: You can view the full event schedule, including keynote speakers, workshops, and panel discussions, on the event page under the "agenda" section.

faq.question: Is there parking available?
faq.answer: Limited parking is available on-site, public transport is recommended.

title: Creative Minds: A Conversation with Sofia Martinez
introduction: Sofia Martinez, award-winning illustrator and animator, discusses her approach to storytelling through art and the impact of visual culture on society.
description: Part of the Creative Minds Series, this session will explore Sofia's artistic process, her work with global brands, and how to push creative boundaries in design and animation.

agenda.title: Check-in & Welcome Drinks
agenda.description: Meet and greet with fellow creatives.

agenda.title: Talk with Sofia Martinez
agenda.description: In-depth discussion of her creative journey.

faq.question: Is there a cost to attend?
faq.answer: Tickets are $25 for general admission and $50 for VIP.

faq.question: Can I bring guests?
faq.answer: Yes, guests are welcome but must be registered.

title: Design Futures: Panel with Emerging Innovators
introduction: Join a panel of emerging design leaders as they explore trends, challenges, and opportunities shaping the future of creative industries.
description: The Design Futures panel features three rising stars in graphic, industrial, and digital design. Attendees will gain insight into cutting-edge tools, approaches, and career strategies.

agenda.title: Panel Discussion
agenda.description: Emerging designers discuss the future of creative industries.

faq.question: Is prior registration required?
faq.answer: Yes, please register online to reserve your spot.
